scripts.local-build:mac: npm run local-build:mac_x64 && npm run local-build:mac_arm64
scripts.local-build:mac_x64: npm run build-backend:mac_x64 && npm run local-build-electron:mac_x64
scripts.local-build:mac_arm64: npm run build-backend:mac_arm64 && npm run local-build-electron:mac_arm64
scripts.local-build-no-sign:mac: npm run local-build-no-sign:mac_x64 && npm run local-build-no-sign:mac_arm64
scripts.local-build-no-sign:mac_x64: npm run build-backend:mac_x64 && npm run local-build-electron-no-sign:mac_x64
scripts.local-build-no-sign:mac_arm64: npm run build-backend:mac_arm64 && npm run local-build-electron-no-sign:mac_arm64
scripts.build-backend:mac_x64: eval "$(/usr/local/bin/brew shellenv)" && source venv_x64/bin/activate && cd backend && arch -x86_64 pyinstaller build_mac_x64.spec
scripts.build-backend:mac_arm64: source venv_arm64/bin/activate && cd backend && pyinstaller build_mac_arm64.spec
scripts.prebuild: npm run build-backend && npm run prebuild-electron
scripts.dev-backend: source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && python3.9 main.py
scripts.format: cd backend && black . && cd ../electron && npm run format
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && pyright && cd ../electron && npm run typecheck
